attributes.action: Remove sharp Labels and replace with velvet or soft materials
attributes.additional_details: If you have sensitive skin, it causes rashes and irritates the skin. If you try to cut the label out, you can end up with a hole in the clothing (and you can’t return it)
attributes.background: Remove all the sharp labels from clothing and replace them with velvet or a soft material, or don’t include labels at all

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for manufacturers.
